description: http://anidb.net/ch1856 [Rika]`s mother and a wife of the http://anidb.net/ch97990 [head priest of Furude Shrine]. She was one of the victims in "The Series of Mysterious Deaths". In Shouwa 56 (1981) her husband died of an unknown illness and she was gone missing (it was suggested that she drowned herself in Onigafuchi Swamp). In Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei she and Rika`s father are both alive.
name: Rika no Haha
